item.description: We found a meeting guidline that looks very good from the HSP Workbook. It's a good time to adopt it. It's a 6 session agenda for 3 to 6 people. Take a look at the file section on the right and the PDF file "HSP Agenda". Email me at munisuser@yahoo.com If you would like to start/join a group with session 1. We have had suggestions to meet in Newton Ctr., Framingham, and the Westwood Starbucks. Or suggest your own When 3 people agree to a location I'll put the meeting time/loc here.

group.name: The first time book writers club for non-professionals

item.name: The Framingham Elaine Aron and Highly Sensitive Persons Meet Meetup
